content: That sounds like a great start! I like the idea of designating a launching pad and establishing a routine. But I'm not sure about using a spreadsheet or digital note-taking app - I'm more of a pen-and-paper kind of person. Would it be okay if I just use a small notebook to log when I wear and clean each item? Also, I'm still thinking about that white button-down shirt I lost - do you have any tips on how I can retrace my steps to figure out where I last had it?
